text: hi I'm Nikki I'm Jason this is Sangha
this is Glee oh she's like at they're
not very well behaved three years ago we
wanted a drastic change in our lives and
we were craving a big adventure so we
started dreaming backpacking across
Europe motorcycles across South America
surf bums in Costa Rica and on and on we
went and then it hit us how can we
explore other countries when we haven't
even explored our own and an RV just
seemed like the best way to travel the
US for a long period of time when we
first started this journey we thought it
would be two years of searching for the
perfect place to settle down and now
that idea is long gone after one short
year we knew we couldn't go back to that
normal life and now it's not even an
option of course that could change down
the road but for now we have one mission
search discover explore and share all
that life has to offer
so the big question we get is why an RV
well there's lots of upsides to RV like
freedom to roam and go anywhere anytime
with the creature comforts of home is
eco friendly believe it or not small
space less waste you're living in nature
so you have the best yards ever and you
don't have to do any landscaping you're
always close to the ones you love and
that's what brings people to down side
of our being is you're always so close
because it's a small space so you're on
top of each other all the time we can't
always stay at a campground sometimes we
have to stay and the dreaded RV parks
some RV parks are like five-star resorts
while others well are like parking lots
the RVs are really close together it's
all concrete and it's mostly retirees so
we stick out like sore thumbs not that
there's anything wrong with that most
the guys here can drink me under the
table I just wish people our age
actually RV RVs are like the little toys
you get in cereal boxes something's
always broken
rattling needs to be fixed and we're not
exactly mechanic
that really sucks I think I fixed it
because we don't exactly know we're
doing so the welcome to our world where
we never know where the road will take
us next we hash out the good the bad and
everything in between we always travel
in style we travel like locals seeing
and experiencing a town as if it were
our own and most importantly each day is
a new adventure
so hop in but go up and join us it gone
with the wind calm
